notes: I copied non-empty abbreviations from antibiotics_hu.js into antibiotics_en.js for 47 entries.
I then applied a small canonical mapping for 28 keys; this resulted in 1 additional change in the English file.
I did not overwrite any existing non-empty abbreviations.
Remaining items without abbreviations are listed in abbrev_current.json under the 'combined' section where en/hu/de values are null.

If you want a git-style unified diff for the exact file changes, run 'git diff' in your repository after staging or before -- I can also produce a unified patch by replacing the full file content on request.
